title: Climate change: Researchers begin discussions on vital report
description: A two-week virtual negotiation begins on the most critical climate change report since 2013.

title: Covid-19: Recent claims about cremations and vaccines fact-checked
description: Debunking claims shared widely on social media about cremations in the UK and US vaccine statistics.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Boat causes false start in men's triathlon
description: Watch the bizarre moment a boat holds up the start of the triathlon at the Toyko 2020 Olympics.

title: The new surgical tool inspired by a wasp
description: The device avoids clogging by using friction instead of suction, similar to the way a parasitoid wasp lays its eggs.

title: Afrobeats in Japan: British-Nigerian hip hop dancer teaching children how to dance
description: Yinka Oshiletu, a British-Nigerian hip hop dancer is bringing Afrobeats sounds to Japan's young dancers.

title: Could Covid vaccine be taken as a pill?
description: Researchers are looking at easier ways for people to get the vaccine, including via inhalers and tablets.

title: Deadly street protests over Iran water shortages
description: Khuzestan is one of the country's hottest regions, where temperatures can reach 50C.

title: Tokyo Olympics: One athlete braved sharks and crocodiles
description: Training for the Olympics can be a full-time job but Jo Brigden-Jones has combined it with much more.

title: Why remote working leaves us vulnerable to cyber-attacks
description: Experts warn working from home has led to complacency over security protocols

title: Dominant Wright thrashes Van den Bergh to win World Matchplay
description: Peter Wright claims his first World Matchplay title as he thrashes defending champion Dimitri van den Bergh in Blackpool.

title: Speakers' Corner: Woman attacked with knife
description: The 39-year-old was taken to hospital after the attack in London's Hyde Park, police say.

title: 'We know they are coming' - Lions lock Itoje wary of South Africa response
description: Maro Itoje warns his British and Irish Lions team-mates to take heed of previous tours and expect a strong response from South Africa on Saturday.

title: Unesco adds Madrid's Paseo del Prado and Retiro Park to heritage list
description: The famous Paseo del Prado and Retiro Park are symbols of the Spanish capital's history.

title: Covid: Fauci says US heading in wrong direction as cases rise
description: President Joe Biden's top medical adviser says cases are rising in areas with low vaccination rates.

title: Parkinson takes 4-9 in Originals win but Stokes criticises 'horrific' wicket
description: Matt Parkinson bamboozles Birmingham Phoenix with a sensational spell of leg-spin bowling to give Manchester Originals their first win of The Hundred.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Adam Peaty breezes into 100m breaststroke final
description: Adam Peaty will aim to become the first British swimmer to retain an Olympic title when he competes in the 100m breaststroke final at 03:12 BST on Monday.

title: Scottish climber Rick Allen dies in K2 avalanche
description: The 68-year-old was attempting a new route on the world's second highest mountain.

title: Rockslide destroys bridge in northern India
description: It was one of several landslides in Himachal Pradesh on Sunday.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Oksana Chusovitina, 46, retires after eighth Olympics
description: After a record eighth Olympic Games, 46-year-old Oksana Chusovitina says goodbye to the sport she has loved since the age of seven.

title: Meteor wows Norway after blazing through night sky
description: The meteor is believed to have landed in a forest after flashes of light were seen across Norway.

title: Man, woman and boy die in Loch Lomond incident
description: The deaths near Ardlui are among six water-related fatalities in Scotland over the past three days.

title: Tokyo Olympics: German women's gymnastics team wears full-body suits
description: Germany's gymnasts wear full-body suits in women's qualification at the Olympics as they continue their stand against the sexualisation of their sport.

title: Football manager Joey Barton charged with attacking woman
description: The former Premier League player is charged by police after an incident in London.

title: Hundred organisers say online 'racism or other forms of abuse' unacceptable
description: Organisers of The Hundred say they do not "accept racism or other forms of abuse" following "recent online comments directed towards players and fans".

title: Sajid Javid apologises for 'cower' Covid remark
description: The health secretary says he used a poor choice of word in a tweet, after criticism from victims' group.

title: Carrickfergus: Funfair incident caused by teens, Planet Fun says
description: Planet Fun says injuries were caused in County Antrim on Saturday because of "misuse of equipment".

title: Tokyo Olympics: Chelsie Giles wins Team GB's first medal with judo bronze
description: Judoka Chelsie Giles wins Team GB's first medal of the Tokyo Olympics with bronze in the women's -52kg event.

title: Tokyo Olympics: 'I put too much pressure on myself' - Jade Jones on shock taekwondo exit
description: Two-time Olympic taekwondo champion Jade Jones discusses her shock defeat to Kimia Alizadeh of the Refugee Olympic Team in the first round of the women's -57kg tournament.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Anna Kiesenhofer wins shock road race gold with GB's Lizzie Deignan 11th
description: Austria's Anna Kiesenhofer launches a remarkable solo breakaway to win road race gold on her Olympic debut, as Britain's Lizzie Deignan finishes 11th.

title: Climate change: Hebden Bridge boy, 11, starts 200 mile walk
description: Jude will walk 10 miles each day for 21 days to reach Westminster, where he will lobby ministers.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Judoka Chelsie Giles wins Team GB's first medal at Tokyo 2020
description: Chelsie Giles becomes Great Britain's first medallist of the Tokyo Olympics, winning bronze after defeating Switzerland's Fabienne Kocher in the women's -52kg judo competition.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Chelsie Giles wins GB's first medal, Bradly Sinden guarantees at least silver
description: Day two of the Tokyo 2020 Olympics is under way, and Team GB's first medal has been won.

title: Tokyo Olympics: 'Not the usual Biles' - US star struggles to find form in qualifying
description: Watch highlights as Simone Biles is far from perfect as the USA finish second behind the Russian Olympic Committee in gymnastics qualifying.

title: Sinden going for Team GB's first Tokyo gold at 13:45 BST in taekwondo
description: Bradly Sinden guarantees Great Britain's second medal of the Tokyo Olympics by reaching the men's -68kg taekwondo final.

title: Afghanistan curfew imposed as Taliban militants advance
description: The government says the measure is to help its forces stop Taliban militants infiltrating cities.

title: Unesco World Heritage: Wales' slate landscape bid for honour
description: Slate from north-west Wales "roofed the 19th Century world" as it was exported around the globe.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Australia set world record in women's 4x100m freestyle relay
description: Watch as the Australian women's 4x100 freestyle relay team set a new world record to win gold on day two of the Tokyo Olympics.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Yuto Horigome wins first ever Olympic skateboarding gold
description: Watch as 22-year-old Yuto Horigome of Japan makes history by becoming the first Olympic skateboarding gold medallist.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Rowing races postponed due to weather and tennis heat policy activated
description: Tokyo 2020 Olympics organisers have cancelled two days of rowing with adverse weather conditions expected to hit Japan's capital.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Tunisia's Ahmed Hafnaoui wins gold, surfing and skateboarding debut & Jade Jones beaten
description: Watch key moments from the early events of day two at the Tokyo Olympics including a swimming shock, new sports taking centre stage and heartbreak for Jade Jones.

title: The Papers: Double jab for football and PM's crime 'blitz'
description: A government plan for vaccine passports to attend football matches is among the front-page stories.

title: UK will be paying for Covid for decades, say MPs
description: They also criticised the government's spending on unusable protective kit and called for an urgent inquiry.

title: Two-time champion Jones loses in Olympics first round
description: Watch the final moments as two-time champion Jade Jones loses in her first match at the Tokyo Olympics to Kimia Alizadeh of the Refugee Olympic Team.
